pages.title: Hairy Rhino
pages.text: It is the only extant species of the genus Dicerorhinus.$(br2)Like both African species, it has two horns; the larger is the nasal horn, typically 15–25 cm ($(o)5.9–9.8 in$()), while the other horn is typically a stub.$(br2)A coat of reddish-brown hair covers most of the Sumatran rhino's body.

pages.title: Hairy Rhino
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Randomly active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:melon_slice$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 12 Days
